title: Rainy city driving with moderate speed and frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle drives on a rainy day in a busy city street, with multiple cars and pedestrians around.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 7.8 m/s). There are 5 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and the visibility is slightly reduced. The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, following a white car in front of it. There are several other cars on the road, including a parked truck on the right side of the road. The traffic lights are visible at the intersections, and some pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalks.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a safe distance from the car in front of it to avoid any potential accidents due to the slippery road conditions. The driver is cautious and brakes frequently to ensure a smooth and safe journey. The presence of pedestrians and other vehicles requires the driver to stay alert and be prepared to react to any sudden changes in the traffic situation.
